CustomField.description: This is the Probability that an Opportunity will be 'Won' and is a critical field for Monthly, Quarterly, Annual Dashboard Components & Reporting as all Dashboard Components are setup with Probability <90% or >90% instead of by 'Won' status. Any 'Won' status sets Probability <90%. Probability is Automated based on Opportunity Stages and rarely requires manual entry from a Lead Producer
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the Probability that an Opportunity will be 'Won' and is a critical field for Monthly, Quarterly, Annual Dashboard Components & Reporting as all Dashboard Components are setup with Probability <90% or >90% instead of by 'Won' status. Any 'Won' status sets Probability <90%. Probability is Automated based on Opportunity Stages and rarely requires manual entry from a Lead Producer
